AddData.pyÔÉÅ

AddData.py script adds a simulation into the Databank based on info.yaml file.

Returning error codes:

2 - filesystem writting errors; 3 - network accessing errors.

usage: AddData.py Script [-h] [-f FILE] [-d] [-n] [-w WORK_DIR] [-o OUTPUT_DIR]

options:
-h, --help

show this help message and exit

-f FILE, --file FILE

Input config file in yaml format.

-d, --debug

enable debug logging output

-n, --no-cache

always redownload repository files

-w WORK_DIR, --work-dir WORK_DIR

set custom temporary working directory

-o OUTPUT_DIR, --output-dir OUTPUT_DIR

set custom output directo
